column5: THIS AREA WILL BE SHARED WITH OTHER PEOPLE. My place is close to bus stops (route 618 & 620), parks (SeaWorld & Six Flags), places to eat (Bush’s Chicken, Dunkin’ Donuts, Freddy’s, Garlic Jim’s, Jimmy John’s, Las Palapas 24 Hr, Popeyes, Raising Cane’s, Shipley Do-nuts, Smash Burger, Yogurt Zone), places to buy groceries (Walmart & HEB), nightlife (Shenanygans bar), medical care (CVS Pharmacy, Walgreens, & FastMed). You will love my place because of the location & the neighborhood.
